instance.name: Triple Triad Invitational Parlor
instance.description: Deep in the heart of the Manderville Gold Saucer, a room has been set aside for Triple Triad players whose love for the game is so passionate, so pure, that they compete with no thought of reward. All that matters is the competition. If you burn to prove yourself against your rivals, friendly or otherwise, then reserve a tournament table in the Triple Triad Invitational Parlor. You choose the time. You decide the rules.
